404.title: We couldn’t find that.
404.desc: Check the URL and try again.

500.title: Something went wrong on the server.
500.desc: We encountered an error on the server. Try again in a few moments.

client.title: Something went wrong on your client.
client.desc: We encountered an error while trying to render or perform an action on your browser. Please try again.

sectionFallback.title: Something went wrong in this section.
sectionFallback.desc: We encountered an error while trying to render or perform an action in this section. Please try again.

maintenance.title: We’ve temporarily closed MySK for maintenance.
maintenance.desc: Please remain patient while we work on maintenance. MySK should be available again soon. Apologies for the inconvenience.

offline.title: Connect to the internet.
offline.desc: This page needs an internet connection to work. Check your connection and try again.
offline.offlineAvailability: Only pages that you frequently visit are available offline.

schoolWiFi.title: School wi-fi
schoolWiFi.desc: Inside the school? You can connect to the “@SK_Student” wi-fi. Ask a classmate or a teacher for instructions.

print.title: Print options
print.note: Note: preview may not be 100% accurate. You may need to adjust scaling or other settings in your browser’s print dialog.

snackbar.formInvalid: Check the form and try again

logOut.title: Log out
logOut.desc: Are you sure you want to log out?
